Text saved: 'Turnover' is when workers leave a company. 'Retention' is when workers stay at a company for a long time.

At our company, Girox Foods, we have a problem. Our turnover is about 12% every year. This means many workers leave our company.

This number is high. For other companies, the number is only 7%.

This report wants to find out why our workers leave. Then, we will give ideas to make the company a better place to work. We want our workers to stay with us. We want to increase our retention.
